TrueMap< K > Class Template Reference
Maps

Detailed Description

template<typename K>
class lemon::TrueMap< K >

This read-only map assigns true to each key.

Note that

* TrueMap<K> tm;
*

is equivalent to

* ConstMap<K,bool> tm(true);
*
See Also
FalseMap
ConstMap

#include <lemon/maps.h>
